Lesido ist eine digitale Bilderbuch-Bibliothek mit integriertem Video-Chat. Damit können Eltern und Großeltern ganz einfach über die Ferne die Lieblingsbücher ihrer Kinder und Enkelkinder vorlesen. Oder natürlich wie gewohnt in Person. Die Lesido Bibliothek beinhaltet hochwertige Bilderbücher für Kinder von 2-8 Jahren von renommierten Verlagen aus Deutschland und der ganzen Welt. 

Warum Vorlesen über die Ferne eine gute Idee ist
- Frühkindliche Entwicklung fördern: Vorlesen fördert Kreativität, Konzentrationsfähigkeit und eine Vielzahl weiterer Fähigkeiten, die für die Entwicklung eines Kindes von zentraler Bedeutung sind.
- Eltern im Alltag entlasten: Großeltern können Eltern entlasten – auch spontan während eines wichtigen Calls im Homeoffice oder für eine Entspannungspause am Abend.
- Nähe erleben trotz Entfernung: Großeltern und Tante weit entfernt? Mama oder Papa oft auf Geschäftsreise? Es gibt viele Gründe nicht vorzulesen. Mit Lesido könnt ihr trotzdem zusammen lesen – jederzeit und von überall.

Was kann die Lesido App alles? 
- Zugriff auf eine riesige Zahl ausgewählter, hochwertiger Kinder- und Bilderbücher von renommierten Verlagen aus Deutschland und aller Welt
- Video Chat Funktion zum gemeinsamen, synchronen Auswählen und Lesen passender Bücher
- Eine auf das Kind zugeschnittene und priorisierte Bibliothek, um schnell Bücher aus der richtigen Altersklasse und Interessen auszuwählen
- Lade neben Großeltern gerne noch Tante und Onkel für ausgewählte Vorlese für eine Tele-Babysitting Einheit mit ein
- Lesido entwickelt sich stetig weiter - schreib uns gerne deine Wünsche und Ideen

Unlike other techniques, you do not need to "reprogram" your brain with various Schulte tables, memory training, vocabulary development, memorizing numbers, etc. Reading speed increases due to the lack of eye movement and focusing of vision in one place. You will see how much you are absorbed in the content of the text, when you realize all the advantages of not having to move your eyes while reading in unnatural directions.

The speed reading technique, in our book reader Bookva, will help increase the speed reading technique from the standard 250 words per minute, the average person, to 600-700 words per minute, and even more.

Reading in Bookva should not create discomfort; if so, then you are using this technology incorrectly. Don't rush to speed up. You will understand when you need to read faster - when you feel that the current speed has become too slow for you. Your increasing speed is the perfect test of reading technique.

The key to space reading technique and speed is regular practice. Practice every day according to our speed reading method and you will see the first results in a week. Lista de cabeças (Antigo Testamento):
Gênesis, Êxodo, Levítico, Números, Deuteronômio, Josué, Juízes, Rute, I Samuel, II Samuel, I Reis, II Reis, I Crônicas, II Crônicas, Esdras, Neemias, Ester, Jó, Salmos, Provérbios, Eclesiastes, Cântico dos Cânticos, Sabedoria, Eclesiástico, Isaías, Jeremias, Lamentações, Baruc, Ezequiel, Daniel, Oséias, Joel, Amós, Abdias, Jonas, Miquéias, Naum, Habacuc, Sofonias, Ageu, Zacarias, Malaquias
Lista de cabeças (Novo Testamento):
São Mateus, São Marcos, São Lucas, São João, Atos dos Apóstolos, Romanos, I Coríntios, II Coríntios, Gálatas, Efésios, Filipenses, Colossenses, I Tessalonicenses, II Tessalonicenses, I Timóteo, II Timóteo, Tito, Filêmon, Hebreus, São Tiago, I São Pedro, II São Pedro, I São João, II São João, III São João, São Judas, Apocalipse
João Ferreira de Almeida
O que se sabe hoje da vida de Almeida está registrado na Dedicatória de um de seus livros e nas atas dos presbitérios de Igrejas Reformadas do Sudeste da Ásia, para as quais trabalhou como pastor, missionário e tradutor, durante a segunda metade do século XVII.
Nascido na cidade de Torres de Tavares, em Portugal, Almeida morreu em 1693 - na Batávia - atual ilha de Java, Indonésia. Com apenas 16 anos, João Ferreira de Almeida dá início à tarefa de tradução da Bíblia, a qual se dedica até o final de sua vida.
Hoje, a tradução Almeida, feita em 1753, se encontra entre nós em diversas versões:
“Versão Antiga”(Sociedade Bíblica Brasileira e outras editoras): por causa da escrupulosa fidelidade aos originais hebraico, aramaico e grego é útil para o estudo, contudo rígida demais para uso litúrgico-catequético.
“Versão Corrigida” (Imprensa Batista): integra correções provindas de manuscritos melhores, atualizando levemente a linguagem.
“Versão atualizada” (Sociedade Bíblica Brasileira): igualmente corrigida com base em melhores manuscritos e atualizada mais corajosamente quanto à linguagem. É a “vulgata” dos protestantes de diversas confissões no Brasil de hoje (Sociedade Bíblica do Brasil, Rio de Janeiro 1969). Existem muitas edições, para usos diferentes; vamos mencionar somente a Bíblia “Vida Nova”, provida de bom material de estudo.

title.label: Bíblia Sagrada Evangélica - Oleg Shukalovich

summary.label:
The Noble Quran, also informally known as the Hilali-Khan translation

Interpretation of the Meanings of the Noble Qur'an (1999) by Darussalam (first published 1977) is translated by Muhammad Muhsin Khan and Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali. This translation is among the most widely read translations in the world, primarily because it is the officially promoted translation of the Saudi Government.

This English translation was sponsored by the Saudi government and is provided free. It has been reported to be the most popular and "Now the most widely disseminated Qur'an in most Islamic bookstores and Sunni mosques throughout the English-speaking world, this new translation is meant to replace the Yusuf 'Ali edition and comes with a seal of approval from both the University of Medina and the Saudi Dar al-Ifta. This venture utilizes mainstream classical sources of commentaries namely, Tabari, Qurtubi, and Ibn Kathir.

As with any translation of the original Arabic into another language, in this case English, this is an interpretation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an (Word of God). The translation is heavily interspersed with commentaries and notes from At-Tabari, Al-Qurtubi and Ibn Kathir.

Mushin Khan completed the translation in twelve years, during which he consulted a number of English versions of the Qur'an but had found that they had ambiguity, shortcomings and dogmatic errors. So later, in association with Dr. Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali, he undertook the task of interpretation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an providing evidences from the authentic sources for clarification.

Abdul Malik Mujahid also said that Khan and Hilali behested that Darussalam Publishers and Distributors bring about a summarized edition in one volume:
"Its popularity among the readers encouraged them to prepare a comprehensive version of the interpretation of the meanings of the Qur'an in nine volumes comprising a number of Ahadith from Sahih Al-Bukhari, Sahih Muslim and other books with comments from Tafsir At-Tabd, Tafsir AI-Qurtubi and Tafsir Ibn Kathir, where necessary to elaborate upon the Qur'anic Verses."

The Quran is the central religious text of Islam, which Muslims believe to be a revelation from God (Arabic: الله‎, Allah). It is widely regarded as the finest piece of literature in the Arabic language. Muslims consider the Quran to be the only book that has been protected by God from distortion or corruption. However, some significant textual variations (employing different wordings) and deficiencies in the Arabic script mean the relationship between the text of today's Quran and an original text is unclear. Quranic chapters are called suras and verses are called ayahs.

title.label: Noble Quran in English & Audio - Tatsiana Shukalovich

* Index / Glossary with thousands of topics and the direct link to the corresponding part in the Holy Quran
* Discover the Holy Quran with numerous topics for the Muslim and non-Muslim reader
* Share Ayat (verses) through email, text / SMS or social media
* Four font sizes
* 10 different accent colors and 'Night Mode'
* Prayer times and prayer alarms, with Azan playback during Salah times
* Qibla compass* Widget to view current Salah times

...and many more features

While no translation of the Quran can be perfect, the translation we chose for this app was done by scholars in the United States and is part of no particular sect or school of thought. Our team compared many different translations and this one of the easier to understand one and comes with a powerful English recitation by Imam Benjamin Bilal, so the user can follow along with the English audio. For side-by-side comparison of this and other Holy Quran renderings into English, please visit our online Quran-comparison project at EnglishQuran.com 
We strove hard to avoid any errors. However, should you find any mistakes or any reproducible bugs please email us and we will try to fix it as soon as possible with the next update.
This is a free app, with no ads or in-app purchases, but we ask to please keep us in your prayers if you like the app. We sincerely thank you for all the encouraging feedback and positive emails from so many of you, and please continue giving us feedback.

Van egy csodaszép város fákkal, virágokkal, titkot rejtő barlangokkal és vidáman kanyargó ösvényekkel. A neve Erdőváros. Itt valamennyi bundás, tollas lakó boldogan él együtt.

Bob meséi (Bob's tales).
Az Erdőváros meséi sorozat új tagja a Bob meséi. A 10 részes történet főhőse Bob kutya, aki a Hol terem a barátság? c. sorozatból is ismert gyerek karakterekkel (Róka Miki, Nyúl Lilla és Medve Matyi) együtt elindul felkutatni az erdő szennyeződésének okát. A nyomozás során Bobék az erdőség lakóival, illetve az Erdei Rendőrkapitányságon dolgozó Zabola Zoli századossal és Kántor ezredessel is találkoznak, akik információikkal segítik a gyerekek ügyét. Ahogy a karakterek egyre közelebb kerülnek a megoldáshoz és egyre több élőlénnyel (pl. virágok, méhek csoportja, halak) találkoznak, az olvasó velük együtt fedezi fel a természetet és annak működését, fontosságát. A kaland boldogan zárul, Bob és társai kitartó munkájának, merészségének, ravaszságának és persze a felnőttek segítségének hála rátalálnak a szennyeződés forrására és megmentik az erdőt. 
A történet magyarul és angolul is elérhető.

Vivlio, expert du livre numérique à la française, vous présente son application mobile, alias la meilleure app pour lire en numérique et écouter du livre audio !

L’application mobile Vivlio vous permet d’emporter partout, tout le temps :
•	votre ou vos livre(s) en cours de lecture
•	votre bibliothèque
•	pour avoir toujours une lecture au bout des doigts !

Spécialement conçue pour les lecteurs qui n’ont pas une minute à perdre, elle est optimisée autant pour la lecture numérique sur smartphone que sur tablette.

L’application mobile Vivlio vous permet de lire et d’écouter lire, autant dans votre lit que dans les transports en commun, pour ne plus jamais perdre votre page en cours.

Depuis votre mobile ou votre tablette, l’application Vivlio vous accompagne où que vous alliez, pour ne jamais perdre une seconde de lecture et avoir votre bibliothèque en poche n’importe où !

Voilà tout ce que vous pouvez faire avec l’application Vivlio :
•	Touchez simplement l’écran pour passer à la page suivante ou précédente, en toute fluidité, comme avec un livre !
•	Personnalisez votre lecture en choisissant la taille du texte, la police (une police spéciale dyslexique est disponible), la couleur du fond d’écran et l’orientation de la page (portrait ou paysage).
•	Écoutez vos livres audio en toute simplicité, dans votre voiture, dans les transports en commun, pendant votre séance de sport ou en cuisinant.
•	Avant d’effectuer un achat, vous pouvez télécharger gratuitement un extrait d’ebook et lire les premières pages.
•	Grâce à MyVivlio, votre dernière page lue sur l’appli mobile est synchronisée automatiquement, de même que vos signets et notes, pour vous permettre de les retrouver sur vos autres supports de lecture Vivlio (liseuse Vivlio, lecteur Vivlio sur ordinateur et portail MyVivlio). Vous pouvez ainsi commencer à lire sur un appareil, et reprendre exactement où vous vous êtes arrêté sur un autre appareil.

Vivlio, c’est des ebooks et des livres audio disponibles partout, tout le temps, en restant dans les petits papiers de votre libraire préféré : Vivlio, Cultura, Decitre, Furet du Nord ou Leclerc.

Vous pouvez donc vous connecter à l’application mobile Vivlio avec votre compte Vivlio, Cultura, Decitre, Furet du Nord ou Leclerc afin de retrouver toute votre bibliothèque numérique concentrée dans votre mobile.
